details.publicNotes: A raven-looking griffon, looking grim and haughty, they donâ€™t seem to carry weapon and, rather than immediately attacking, seem more interested in talking.

description.value: The target creature within reach of the griffon must make a @Check[will|dc:13] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1} as they laugh. A critical failure results in @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 2}.

With a quick squawk, the griffon vanishes, becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} for two rounds. This ends on taking a hostile action. The griffon may not use this spell again for [[/br 1d4]] rounds.
